rComments: Kate Schatz is an excellent teacher, very supportive of her students, and an extremely kind and understanding person.  She is totally down to earth, but also a tough grader who really expects excellence from her students.

Kate Schatz was a great teacher & full of energy. If you show an interest in subjects related to her class, she will educate you as much as she can (which is a lot) and give you further references to learn more on  your own. She's incredibly intelligent and although has strong opinions, I realized her thoughts on prejudice/race/gender were spot on.

Kate Schatz is an inspiration! She is definitely a hardass, but it is 100% worth it. She is awesomely sarcastic and will let you know if you're being an idiot. I spent 5-7 hours on 3-page papers she assigned- she is serious about her work and is damn good at it.

Incredible creative writing teacher! Professional, knowledgeable and very on top of her game- she is both writer and publisher. I felt like I was in the right hands. She took everyone very seriously and had very good feedback for all the different writing styles present in the class. She's also cool, hella funny and easy to talk with. Great advice
